title: On the order of 4-dimensional regular polytope numbers
authors: Anji Dong, The Nguyen, Alexandru Zaharescu
abstract:
In light of Kim's conjecture on regular polytopes of dimension four, which is
a generalization of Waring's problem, we establish asymptotic formulas for
representing any sufficiently large integer as a sum of numbers in the form of
those regular 4-polytopes. Moreover, we are able to obtain a more general
result of the asymptotics for any degree-four polynomial $f$ satisfying
$f(0)=0$ and $f(1)=1$.
